description: Michael Parks, Luke Bender, Neil Thomas and Lee Jennings return from town and head into their poolside room.  The guys are horned up and decide to help each other out.  Lee starts things off by quickly getting his mouth on Neil once it is offered to him.  That is all it takes to get this hot four way started.  After all the sucking and fucking that takes place, the guys hit the pool to cool off.
title: Revenge
